forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Windy with rain likely. High 12C. Winds S at 40 to 55 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall possibly over 25mm. Winds could occasionally gust over 80 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy and windy with periods of rain. High 56F. Winds SSE at 25 to 35 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall possibly over one inch. Winds could occasionally gust over 50 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Windy with rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers overnight. Low near 10C. Winds S at 40 to 55 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near 25mm. Winds could occasionally gust over 80 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Windy. A steady rain this evening, with showers continuing overnight. Low 53F. Winds S at 25 to 40 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall possibly over one inch. Winds could occasionally gust over 50 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. High 59F. Winds S at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early with overcast skies late. Low 48F. Winds SW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies early will become partly cloudy later at night. Low around 45F. Winds NW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday
